title: IPH 468 - Spirit of God, our hearts inspire

lines: Spirit of God, our hearts inspire,
Source of the old prophetic fire,
Come, Holy Spirit, Lord, by whom
the Key to all God’s truth, now come,
O spread your wings, celestial Dove,
and let there now be light.
God, through Himself, we then shall know
and sound, with all Your saints below,

CCLI:
Charles Wesley, 1707-1788
adapted Compilers of Praise! 2000 CCLI 128675
